name: OpenMinded
storyline: Follow the journey of a girl who's life is flipped upside down as she starts to discover her world is filled with strange monsters, good and bad. Embark on a story that will explore the deepest, darkest areas of the unknown that will stay with you forever.
summary:
A 2D/3D Cinematic Horror Adventure Game. In early stages of development. 
 
Feeling Terrible Studio is producing its first game and would love to invite everyone to follow us as we progress on the development from sketch to game. Follow us on Instagram and twitter to see our sketchbook, artworks, animations, teasers and much more.
